name: Green Beans With Sesame and Soy
keywords: green beans, lemon, sesame seeds, soy sauce, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound fresh green beans, washed, ends trimmed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the beans in a large pot of salted, rapidly boiling water. Drain and cool under cold running water. In a large skillet, warm the oil. Add the beans and toss. Add the soy sauce and the lemon juice and cook, tossing constantly, for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat. Season and sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
